name: You Say Hippie Like It's a Bad Thing
description:
Being a Hippie is a way of life. It's about peace, love, happiness, and not falling into the pressures of society. The stigma these days tries to act like being a hippie is a bad thing. We don't agree, do you?


*This is the classic version of the LIMITED EDITION "You Say Hippie Like It's a Bad Thing" t-shirt we originally had up. The other version sold out and will not be back up! We still have uni-sex sizes. The shirt is 100% cotton. 

We apologize for ANY confusion or time delay from ordering, to refunds! Please forgive us - One Love! ;)

name: Are You Sapiosexual?
description:
These shirts are the beginning of a "Being Smart is Sexy" series. I've always been highly attracted to intelligence and found it frustrating seeing people bypass the beauty of an intelligent person for a "pretty" or "handsome" face only. You see shirts that represent "sex appeal" all day long, but what about "intelligence appeal?" If you feel the same, this tank is for you. 

*UNISEX SIZES*
